XXLChess

类 App

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • XXLChess.App
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class App
extends processing.core.PApplet
    The main app to start the game. Including all the keyboard and mouse detection. The main game loop is contain in draw method
